header.title: Digital Marketing Master
header.desc: Complete Digital Marketing Course with Live sessions, 100+ Tools, 10+ Branded Certificate, guaranteed Internship and assured placement assistance.
header.firstPoint: Creating professional website on WordPress/Shopify and hoisting the same.
header.secondPoint: Email Marketing and Social media marketing
header.thirdPoint: SEO, SEM, GTM and application of  Gen-AI
header.fourthPoint: Performance Marketing - Google Ads, Google Analytics

Module0.title: Module 1
Module0.title1: Create a website on WordPress/Shopify & host the same
Module0.descS: Through a hands-on approach, you will learn key programming concepts of Python, MatplotLib, Seaborn and languages commonly used in the data science field. Whether you're aspiring to become a data scientist or simply seeking to harness the power of programming for data analysis, this module equips you with the essential skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize data effectively.

chap.title: Lesson 1:Build a Professional Website, get a domain & host it for yourself. ( 3 hrs )

desc: Overview of Canva and Looka, basic design principles.

desc: Color theory, palettes, and typography basics.

chap.title: Lesson 3: Layout and Composition (1 hrs)
desc: Effective layout techniques using Canva.

chap.title: Lesson 5: Branding (1 hrs)
desc: Creating brand assets in Canva and logo design with Looka.

chap.title: Lesson 6: Social Media Graphics (2 hrs)
desc: Designing for social platforms and creating marketing materials.

chap.title: Lesson 7: Portfolio Development (2 hrs)
desc: Building a portfolio in Canva and presentation skills.

Module0.title: Module 3
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction
desc: Overview of SEO & evolution of search engines, impact of SEO in digital marketing

chap.title: Lesson 2: Fundamentals of Search Engines
desc: Backend workings, crawling, indexing, ranking, Google algorithm updates (Panda, Penguin, Hummingbird, etc.)

chap.title: Lesson 3: Keyword Research
desc: Importance, research techniques, long-tail keywords and intent analysis.

chap.title: Lesson 4: On-Page SEO
desc: Title tags, meta descriptions, header tags, URL structure, internal linking, image optimization, markup schema, page speed

chap.title: Lesson 5: Off-Page SEO
desc: Link building strategies (guest blogging, broken link building, etc.), social signals, canonical URLs, robot texts, backlink outreach campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 6: Technical SEO
desc: Website architecture, URL optimization, site speed, HTTPS and security, technical audits.

chap.title: Lesson 7: Local SEO
desc: Introduction, local keyword research, Google My Business, citation building, on-page optimization, local link building, local SEO for mobile

chap.title: Lesson 8: Mobile SEO
desc: Mobile-friendly design, performance optimization, technical fundamentals, keyword research, content optimization, local mobile SEO

chap.title: Lesson 9: SEO Analytics and Reporting
desc: SEO audits (technical, on-page, off-page, local), competitor analysis, reporting, and recommendations

chap.title: Lesson 10: Negative SEO
desc: Manual penalties, algorithmic penalties, Google sandbox effect, deindexing

Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Email Marketing
desc: Overview of email marketing and its importance in digital marketing strategies, Introduction to email marketing tools like MailModo, Mailchimp, Mailerlite, Sumo, Convertful, Subjectline.com, and Convertkit

chap.title: Lesson 2: Building Email Lists
desc: Strategies for building an email list organically, Using lead magnets, opt-in forms, and landing pages to capture email addresses, Hands-on practice with tools like Sumo and Convertful for list-building

chap.title: Lesson 3: Email Campaign Creation
desc: Understanding different types of email campaigns (e.g., newsletters, promotional emails, drip campaigns), Crafting effective email copy and subject lines for maximum engagement, Using email templates and drag-and-drop editors in tools like Mailchimp and Mailerlite

chap.title: Lesson 4: Email Automation
desc: Introduction to email automation and its benefits, Setting up automated email sequences for onboarding, lead nurturing, and customer engagement, Hands-on practice with automation features in Mailchimp and Convertkit

chap.title: Lesson 5: Email Design and Optimization
desc: Design best practices for email templates and layouts, Optimizing emails for mobile responsiveness and deliverability, Using A/B testing to optimize email content, subject lines, and send times

chap.title: Lesson 6: Email List Segmentation and Personalization
desc: Understanding the importance of list segmentation for targeted email campaigns, Creating segmented lists based on subscriber behavior, demographics, and preferences, Personalizing email content and subject lines to increase engagement and conversions

chap.title: Lesson 7: Email Analytics and Reporting
desc: Overview of key email marketing metrics (e.g., open rates, click-through rates, conversion rates), Using analytics dashboards in tools like Mailchimp, Mailerlite, and Convertkit to track campaign performance, Interpreting email data and making data-driven decisions to optimize future campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 8: Compliance and Legal Considerations
desc: Understanding email marketing laws and regulations (e.g., GDPR, CAN-SPAM Act), Ensuring compliance with permission-based marketing practices and opt-in requirements, Implementing unsubscribe links and managing subscriber preferences

chap.title: Lesson 9: Advanced Email Marketing Strategies
desc: Exploring advanced email marketing tactics like email retargeting, dynamic content, and interactive emails, Integrating email marketing with other digital marketing channels for cohesive campaigns, Case studies and real-world examples of successful email marketing campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 10: Email Deliverability and Reputation Management
desc: Strategies for improving email deliverability and avoiding spam filters, Maintaining a positive sender reputation and managing email bounce rates, Troubleshooting common deliverability issues and optimizing email sending practices

chap.title: Lesson 11: Email Marketing Automation Tools and Integrations
desc: Reviewing additional email marketing automation tools and integrations available, Exploring advanced features and functionalities in tools like MailModo, Sumo, and Subjectline.com, Hands-on practice with advanced email marketing workflows and automation sequences

chap.title: Lesson 12: Final Projects and Certification
desc: Developing a comprehensive email marketing campaign using the skills and knowledge gained throughout the course, Presenting final projects and receiving feedback from instructors and peers, Reviewing course materials and preparing for certification exam or assessment

chap.title: Lesson 9: Video Distribution and Promotion

chap.title: Lesson 10: Developing a Video Marketing Strategy
desc: Creating a Video Content Calendar, Integration with Overall Marketing Strategy, Case Studies and Success Stories

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Content Personalization
desc: Overview of Content Personalization, Importance of Personalization in Digital Marketing, Trends and Case Studies

chap.title: Lesson 2: Understanding Your Audience
desc: Audience Research Methods, Segmentation Strategies, Buyer Personas and User Personas

chap.title: Lesson 3: Collecting User Data for Personalization
desc: Types of User Data (Behavioral, Demographic, Psychographic), Data Collection Methods (Cookies, User Accounts, Surveys), Privacy and Data Protection Regulations

chap.title: Lesson 4: Content Personalization Technologies
desc: Introduction to Personalization Tools and Platforms, Machine Learning and AI for Personalization, Dynamic Content Generation

chap.title: Lesson 5: Personalizing Website Content
desc: Website Personalization Strategies, Dynamic Content Recommendations, Personalized Landing Pages

chap.title: Lesson 6: Personalizing Email Marketing
desc: Segmentation and Targeting in Email Campaigns, Dynamic Email Content, Personalized Email Automation

chap.title: Lesson 7: Personalizing Social Media Marketing
desc: Custom Audiences and Lookalike Audiences, Personalized Ad Targeting, Social Media Listening and Engagement

chap.title: Lesson 8: Personalizing Content Across Channels
desc: Omni-channel Personalization Strategies, Integrating Data Across Platforms, Creating Consistent Brand Experiences

chap.title: Lesson 9: Testing and Optimization
desc: A/B Testing for Personalization, Multivariate Testing, Data-Driven Decision Making

chap.title: Lesson 10: Measuring Personalization Effectiveness
desc: Key Metrics for Personalization (Engagement, Conversions, Retention), Analytics Tools and Dashboards, ROI Calculation

chap.title: Lesson 11: Ethical Considerations in Content Personalization
desc: Transparency and Consent, Avoiding Bias in Personalization Algorithms, Balancing Personalization with Privacy

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to E-commerce Optimization
desc: Understanding the importance of e-commerce optimization, Overview of key metrics and KPIs for e-commerce success

chap.title: Lesson 2: User Experience Optimization
desc: Importance of user experience (UX) in e-commerce, Conducting website usability audits, Implementing best practices for mobile responsiveness and site speed

chap.title: Lesson 3: Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
desc: Understanding the conversion funnel, A/B testing and multivariate testing for optimization, Strategies for improving product page conversions and checkout process

chap.title: Lesson 4: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for E-commerce
desc: Keyword research and on-page optimization for product pages, Optimizing product descriptions, titles, and meta tags, E-commerce SEO tools and best practices

chap.title: Lesson 5: E-commerce Content Marketing
desc: Creating compelling product descriptions and content, Leveraging content marketing to drive traffic and conversions, Using user-generated content and reviews to boost sales

chap.title: Lesson 6: E-commerce Email Marketing
desc: Building and segmenting an e-commerce email list, Creating effective email campaigns for product promotions and abandoned carts, Personalization techniques for e-commerce email marketing

chap.title: Lesson 7: Social Media Marketing for E-commerce
desc: Utilizing social media platforms for e-commerce marketing, Strategies for driving sales through social media advertising, Influencer marketing and partnerships for e-commerce brands

chap.title: Lesson 8: E-commerce Analytics and Reporting
desc: Setting up e-commerce tracking in Google Analytics, Analyzing e-commerce metrics and performance data, Using data insights to make informed optimization decisions

chap.title: Lesson 9: Customer Retention and Loyalty
desc: Implementing strategies to increase customer retention, Loyalty programs and incentives for repeat purchases, Post-purchase communication and customer support

chap.title: Lesson 10: E-commerce Trends and Emerging Technologies
desc: Exploring emerging trends in e-commerce optimization, Leveraging technologies like AI and machine learning for e-commerce, Case studies and examples of successful e-commerce optimization strategies

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Social Commerce
desc: Overview of social commerce and its importance in digital marketing, Case studies of successful social commerce campaigns, Introduction to major social media platforms and their role in social commerce

chap.title: Lesson 2: Social Media Marketing Fundamentals
desc: Understanding the fundamentals of social media marketing, Developing a social media strategy for e-commerce businesses, Content creation and curation for social media platforms

chap.title: Lesson 3: Building a Social Commerce Presence
desc: Setting up and optimizing social media profiles for e-commerce, Integrating e-commerce functionality into social media channels, Leveraging user-generated content and social proof for social commerce

chap.title: Lesson 4: Driving Traffic and Engagement
desc: Strategies for driving traffic to social commerce channels, Techniques for increasing engagement and interaction with followers, Utilizing social media advertising for e-commerce

chap.title: Lesson 5: Conversion Optimization
desc: Understanding the customer journey in social commerce, Implementing conversion optimization techniques on social media, A/B testing and analyzing results for continuous improvement

chap.title: Lesson 6: Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
desc: Building and nurturing customer relationships on social media, Implementing CRM strategies to drive repeat purchases and loyalty, Handling customer inquiries, feedback, and complaints on social media

chap.title: Lesson 7: Measuring Performance
desc: Key metrics and KPIs for measuring social commerce performance, Using analytics tools to track and analyze social media performance, Interpreting data to make informed decisions and optimize campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Mobile Marketing
desc: Understanding the significance of mobile devices in digital marketing, Overview of mobile marketing trends and statistics

chap.title: Lesson 2: Mobile-First Marketing Strategies
desc: Developing mobile-first marketing strategies, Creating responsive and mobile-friendly websites, Importance of mobile optimization for user experience and SEO

chap.title: Lesson 3: Mobile Search Optimization
desc: Understanding mobile search behavior, Optimizing websites for mobile search engines (e.g., Google Mobile-First Indexing), Implementing mobile SEO best practices

chap.title: Lesson 4: Mobile Advertising
desc: Introduction to mobile advertising platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads), Creating mobile ad campaigns and targeting mobile audiences, Best practices for mobile ad design and optimization

chap.title: Lesson 5: Mobile App Marketing
desc: Overview of mobile app marketing strategies, App Store Optimization (ASO) for iOS and Android apps, Promoting mobile apps through various channels (e.g., app install campaigns, influencer marketing)

chap.title: Lesson 6: Location-Based Marketing
desc: Understanding location-based marketing technologies (e.g., geotargeting, geofencing), Implementing location-based marketing campaigns, Case studies and examples of successful location-based marketing initiatives

chap.title: Lesson 7: Mobile Analytics and Measurement
desc: Introduction to mobile analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics), Tracking and analyzing mobile user behavior and engagement, Key mobile metrics and KPIs for measuring campaign performance

chap.title: Lesson 8: Mobile CRM and Customer Engagement
desc: Leveraging mobile channels for customer relationship management (CRM), Implementing mobile marketing automation and personalization, Strategies for engaging and retaining mobile customers

chap.title: Lesson 7: Emerging Trends in Mobile Marketing
desc: Exploring emerging technologies and trends in mobile marketing (e.g., AI-driven mobile experiences, mobile AR/VR), Discussion on the future of mobile marketing and predictions for industry developments

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Voice and Audio Marketing:
desc: Overview of voice and audio marketing trends, Importance of audio content in digital marketing

chap.title: Lesson 2: Creating Compelling Podcast Content
desc: Understanding the podcasting landscape, Planning and scripting podcast episodes, Tips for recording high-quality audio

chap.title: Lesson 3: Audio Advertising Opportunities
desc: Overview of audio advertising platforms (e.g., Spotify, Pandora), Creating effective audio ads, Targeting and tracking audio ad campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 4: Voice User Interface (VUI) Design Principles
desc: Fundamentals of VUI design, Best practices for designing voice-enabled applications, User experience (UX) considerations for VUIs

chap.title: Lesson 5: Developing Voice-Activated Skills and Actions
desc: Introduction to voice-activated applications (e.g., Alexa Skills, Google Actions), Planning and designing voice-activated experiences, Building and testing voice-activated skills and actions

chap.title: Lesson 6: Measuring Voice and Audio Marketing Performance
desc: Key performance indicators (KPIs) for voice and audio marketing, Tools for tracking and analyzing podcast performance, Metrics for evaluating audio advertising campaigns

chap.title: Lesson 7: Future Trends in Voice and Audio Marketing
desc: Emerging technologies shaping the future of voice and audio marketing, Predictions for the evolution of voice assistants and smart speakers, Opportunities and challenges for voice and audio marketing professionals

chap.title: Lesson 8: Content Personalization in Audio Marketing
desc: Understanding the importance of content personalization, Strategies for creating personalized audio content, Tools for delivering personalized audio experiences

chap.title: Lesson 9: Leveraging Social Media for Audio Marketing
desc: Integrating audio content into social media platforms, Strategies for promoting podcasts and audio content on social media, Engaging with audiences through live audio streaming

FaqDATA.ans: This course is ideal for Student, Freshers, Sales & Marketing Professional, Product Managers, Senior Manager & VPs, Freelancers,Homemakers and entrepreneur.

FaqDATA.ques: What will I learn in this course?
FaqDATA.ans: This course provides complete knowledge on Digital Marketing including the  sub-domains like - Performance marketing,Growth marketing SEO, SEM, Graphic Desiging, Email marketing, Affiliate & Content marketing and Social Media marketing and implementation of Gen-AI.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any prerequisites for this course ?
FaqDATA.ans: There are no specific prerequisites. However, basic computer skills and familiarity with the internet will be helpful.
Yes, the course is 100% live online. We will provide instructor based live classes wherein ou can understand all topics thoroughly and ask your doubts if you have any.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification will I receive?
FaqDATA.ans: Upon successful completion of the course, you will receive 10+ branded certifications that can be added to your resume and LinkedIn profile.

FaqDATA.ques: How much does the course cost?
FaqDATA.ans: The course costs INR 6500 plus GST

FaqDATA.ques: How will this course benefit my career?
FaqDATA.ans: This course will equip you with essential digital marketing skills, making you more competitive in the job market. It opens up opportunities in various roles such as Digital Marketing Specialist, SEO Expert, Social Media Manager, Content Marketer, and more.

FaqDATA.ques: What tools and platforms will I learn to use?
FaqDATA.ans: You will learn 100+ tools with 30+ projects and case-studies.

FaqDATA.ques: Does this course comes with Internship opportunity?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, we provide 4 types of internships.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the duration for which I can access this course?
FaqDATA.ans: The duration of this course is 6 months.

FaqDATA.ques: Is there a job placement assistance program?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, We do provide guaranteed job assistance.

FaqDATA.ques: Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied with the course?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, this course has a refund policy. You can take the refund within 15 days from the purchase date of the product and the course should not be accessed by more than 10%. With no questions ask policy.
